featuredProjects.title: Next-Gen E-commerce Platform
featuredProjects.description: Revolutionary e-commerce solution featuring AI-powered product recommendations, real-time inventory management, and multi-channel payment integration. Built with scalable architecture capable of handling 1M+ monthly page views.

featuredProjects.title: Enterprise Design System
featuredProjects.description: Comprehensive design system for large-scale enterprises. Features 50+ reusable components, automated accessibility testing, and multilingual documentation. Achieved 40% improvement in development efficiency.

featuredProjects.title: Real-time Analytics Platform
featuredProjects.description: Enterprise-grade real-time analytics platform with big data processing, interactive dashboards, and predictive analytics capabilities. Achieved 300% improvement in data processing speed.

allProjects.title: E-commerce Platform

allProjects.title: Design System

allProjects.title: Analytics Dashboard

allProjects.title: Mobile Banking App

allProjects.title: Content Management System

allProjects.title: Learning Management Platform
